dct_alternative_sm: Palastinae sive totius Terrae Promissionis nova descriptio auctore tile mano stelia sigenens
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Leuce", "Mil Germa", "Stadia", and "Millia Italica".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text: Antiquissima huius terre appellatio...
